xxl.core.collections.containers.recordManager

Interface TIdManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Convertable, Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    IdentityTIdManager, MapTIdManager

    public interface TIdManager
extends Convertable
    A class that implements this interface allows to translate/map a special kind of identifier into tupel identifyers. Inside a RecordManager there exist only tuple identifyer (physical identifyer) which determine the position of a record. But outside a RecordManager, there can be different types of identifyer (logical identifyer, type: Object) which are translated back and forth by a TIdManager.

    Remove operations signal that a certain Id is not needed any longer. Implementing classes usually store its internal data structure inside a container. The state of the TIdManager can be stored/retrieved by the methods of the Convertable interface (read and write).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the TIdManager which might be needed to make the id mapping persistent.
      int getIdSize()
      Returns the size of the ids in bytes.
      Iterator ids()
      Returns all currently stored ids in arbitrary order.
      Object insert(TId tid)
      Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer.
      FixedSizeConverter objectIdConverter()
      Returns a converter for the ids which are translated by the manager into TIds.
      TId query(Object id)
      Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer.
      void remove(Object id)
      Signals that the identifier is no longer needed.
      void removeAll()
      Signals that all identifiers are no longer needed.
      void update(Object id, TId newTId)
      Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer.
      boolean useLinks()
      Determines if the TIdManager uses TId-Links.

      • Methods inherited from interface xxl.core.io.Convertable

        read, write

    • Method Detail

      • query

        TId query(Object id)
        Translates an identifyer into a tuple identifyer. If the id does not exist then the return value is unspecified.
        Parameters:
        id - identifyer
        Returns:
        the tuple identifyer for the given identifyer.

      • ids

        Iterator ids()
        Returns all currently stored ids in arbitrary order. If null is returned, then there is an identity mapping between Ids and TIds.
        Returns:
        Iterator with the ids or null.

      • insert

        Object insert(TId tid)
        Inserts a new TId and returns an identifyer. The RecordManager registers a tuple identifyer and gets back an identifyer for the object (which can also be the same tid). The TIdManager must be able to translate the returned Object back into the same TId.
        Parameters:
        tid - tuple identifyer
        Returns:
        the identifyer under which the Record is reachable from outside the RecordManager.

      • update

        void update(Object id,
            TId newTId)
        Signals that an identifyer gets a new tuple identifyer.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifyer used inside the application.
        newTId - The new tuple identifyer inside the RecordManager.

      • remove

        void remove(Object id)
        Signals that the identifier is no longer needed.
        Parameters:
        id - the identifyer which has been given out is no longer needed by the RecordManager.

      • removeAll

        void removeAll()
        Signals that all identifiers are no longer needed.

      • close

        void close()
        Closes the TIdManager which might be needed to make the id mapping persistent. After a call to close, the behaviour of further method calls is unspecified (except read and write which have to work properly).

      • useLinks

        boolean useLinks()
        Determines if the TIdManager uses TId-Links. This is only possible iff the Ids to be translated are TIds.
        Returns:
        true iff links are uses inside the RecordManager.

      • objectIdConverter

        FixedSizeConverter objectIdConverter()
        Returns a converter for the ids which are translated by the manager into TIds.
        Returns:
        a converter for serializing the identifiers.

      • getIdSize

        int getIdSize()
        Returns the size of the ids in bytes.
        Returns:
        the size in bytes of each id.
